title: New & Video: Eyedress – White Lies
body:
**[Eyedress](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/18226-video-eyedress-everything-we-touch-turns-into-gold/ "Video: Eyedress – Everything We Touch Turns Into Gold")** for the most part has impressed me, but it’s his new tune/video, _White Lies_, that finally proclaims him as an artist with a level of longevity. Like the material that came before, it’s fairly different in style to his earlier work, with this cut taking a surprisingly interesting glitch/dub approach. Yet despite his sporadic attitude to creation, his music still manages to sound like **Eyedress**, which for a brand new artist is achievement in itself.

[Eyedress – White Lies](http://vimeo.com/53742536) from [EYEDRESS](http://vimeo.com/awesomer) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
